name: EQUALS PORTION OF
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the =MID() function.
syntax: EQU_MID recv_field FLD parse_fld START start_val NCHR num_chrs MEM_AREA

parameters.name: recv_field
parameters.description: The field that is going to receive the portion of the parse_fld.

parameters.name: parse_fld
parameters.description: The field that you want a part of.

parameters.name: START
parameters.description: start_val - The starting position for the portion to extract.

parameters.name: NCHR
parameters.description: num_chrs - The number of characters to extract.

comments: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the =MID() function.
